scripts.dev: concurrently -n 'docs,form,utils' -c 'green,blue,gray' 'npm run dev -w=docs' 'npm run dev -w=@blitzar/form' 'npm run dev -w=@blitzar/utils'
scripts.build:for-publish: lerna run build && lerna run build-example && npm run build:vue-int && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: build" && git push
scripts.build:favicon: copyfiles media/* packages/docs/public && npm run build:favicon -w docs-0.x
scripts.build-and-publish: npm run build:for-publish && npm run publish
scripts.publish:post: git add -A && git commit -m "chore: post-build" && git push
scripts.deploy:docs: npm run build:for-publish && firebase deploy --only hosting && git add -A && git commit -m "chore: deploy" && git push && npm run publish:post
scripts.dep:update-all: ncu --target minor -u && lerna exec 'ncu --target minor -u' && npm i
scripts.dep:reinstall-all:hard: rimraf package-lock.json && npm run _dep:clean && npm i
